info.author: Denis Untevskiy
classifiers: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: News/Diary
info.description:
==========
        Selfcaster
        ==========
        
        Selfcaster is a personal communication platform. It allows an enduser
        to communicate in public (to blog-platforms or social networks) or in private
        (email, IMs or social networks). And, that's important, do it in one place.
        
        Main goals are:
        
         * privacy
         * full ownnership on history with fast and flexible search
         * support of most-popular broadcast channels
        
        Technically Selfcaster is project for `Django framework`.
        
        Important legal notification
        ----------------------------
        
        BSD-license is the **preliminary** one. It may be reconsidered in the nearest
        releases.
        
        .. _Django framework: https://www.djangoproject.com
info.name: selfcaster
info.summary: Personal communication platform - your personal command center to communicate in public (to blog-platforms or social networks) or in private (email, IMs or social networks).
info.html_description:
==========
Selfcaster
==========

Selfcaster is a personal communication platform. It allows an enduser
to communicate in public (to blog-platforms or social networks) or in private
(email, IMs or social networks). And, that's important, do it in one place.

Main goals are:

* privacy
* full ownnership on history with fast and flexible search
* support of most-popular broadcast channels

Technically Selfcaster is project for `Django framework`.

Important legal notification
----------------------------

BSD-license is the **preliminary** one. It may be reconsidered in the nearest
releases.

.. _Django framework: https://www.djangoproject.com
